itemDescription: Scottish Unionist who served as the Member of Parliament (1873-1928)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Aitken Clark Hutchison   (6 July 1873 – 22 December 1928) was a Scottish Unionist who served as the Member of Parliament for Midlothian and Peebles Northern from 1922 to 1923, and from 1924 until his death.
